name: Bible Puzzle Games
description:
Recreate the Gospel of Matthew by playing puzzles games.

Three complete games: jigsaw puzzles, 15 puzzle and piece escape.

  • Over 40 biblical images to play.
  • Five levels of difficulty:  from 9 to 64 pieces.
  • Story mode:  through images and dialogues the entire gospel of Matthew is explained.
  • Excellent opportunity to introduce the Bible to children or new Bible students.
  • Three different languages: English, Portuguese or Spanish.

If you find any bug or translation errors, please leave a comment. It will help a lot!
